data.title: Paid Internship Available With ESPN Southwest Florida
data.meta_description: The Internship Program for Beasley Media Group radio stations WXKB, WJPT, WRXK, WBCN, and WWCN in Fort Myers, Florida, is a paid internship.
data.text:
The Internship Program for Beasley Media Group radio stations WXKB, WJPT, WRXK, WBCN, and WWCN in Fort Myers, Florida, is a paid position that is designed to give students hands-on experience with the various aspects of website and social content creation for radio stations.

This program is available to students working for academic credit, who are able to work 10-15 hours per week for twelve weeks. Additionally, interns are trained and supervised by the Digital Programming Department. Interns must be resourceful and willing to initiate projects. Good communication skills and attention to detail are important. Knowledge of Word Press is a plus.

Required skills necessary for this opportunity:

A college junior or senior with aptitude for writing and content creation/management

Shooting & editing video and audio is a bonus

Must be familiar with social networking sites

Experience in WordPress is not necessary but will be taught

Ability to meet tight deadlines and schedules

Highly organized and able to multi-task

Strong presentation and communication skills

A love for music, sports, and lifestyle culture writing is preferred

The benefits:

Opportunity to work directly in the radio / digital publishing industry. Your published works can be used to build your portfolio.

This is a paid internship that must be done for approved credits only; student must be enrolled in an accredited university.
